MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G31 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:07am. Our engineers have arrived onsite at London Road and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:33am on 17th January
